summary: DROVE MY TRUCK HOME FROM WORK YESTERDAY AND AT 30 MPH MY ENGINE BLEW A SPARK PLUG.  THE ESTIMATE FOR REPAIR IS $3000+.  I RESEARCHED ON LINE AND FOUND OUT THIS IS A KNOWN PROBLEM.  I CONTACTED FORD AT THEIR CUSTOMER SERVICE DEPARTMENT IN DEARBORN, MI AND THEY REFUSE TO PAY FOR THE COSTS OF THIS KNOWN ISSUE.  *JB
